General.Name: Nordfyns Bank A/S
General.Description: Nordfyns Bank A/S provides banking and related financial products to individuals, and small and medium-sized businesses in Denmark. The company offers accounts and deposits, loans, and savings products; and debit cards, mobile banking, and currency and travel currency services. Nordfyns Bank A/S was founded in 1897 and is headquartered in Odense, Denmark.
